actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the development of demonstration and evaluation programs to insure the delivery of adequate health services for persons who have recently migrated to the United States.

summary.text: Alien Health Services Act - Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare, under the Public Health Service Act, to make grants to public and private nonprofit agencies in order to provide for the development of demonstration and evaluation programs to insure the delivery of adequate health services for persons who have recently migrated to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the development of demonstration and evaluation programs to insure the delivery of adequate health services for persons who have recently migrated to the United States.
